question: What is a String in C Language.?
option1: A) String is a new Data Type in C
option2: B) String is an array of Characters with null character as the last element of array.
option3: C) String is an array of Characters with null character as the first element of array
option4: D) String is an array of Integers with 0 as the last element of array.

question:
Choose a correct statement about C String.
char ary[]="Hello..!";
option1: A) Character array, ary is a string.
option2: B) ary has no Null character at the end
option3: C) String size is not mentioned
option4: D) String can not contain special characters.

How do you accept a Multi Word Input in C Language.?
Choose a correct C Statement about Strings.
option1: A) PRINTF is capable of printing a multi word string.
option2: B) PUTS is capable of printing a multi word string.
